name: HomologicalComplex.instIsNormalEpiCategory
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsNormalEpiCategory (HomologicalComplex C c)
decl:
noncomputable instance : IsNormalEpiCategory (HomologicalComplex C c) := ⟨fun p _ =>
  ⟨NormalEpi.mk _ (kernel.ι p) (kernel.condition _)
    (isColimitOfEval _ _ (fun _ =>
      Abelian.isColimitMapCoconeOfCokernelCoforkOfπ _ _))⟩⟩

name: HomologicalComplex.instIsNormalMonoCategory
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
⊢ CategoryTheory.IsNormalMonoCategory (HomologicalComplex C c)
decl:
noncomputable instance : IsNormalMonoCategory (HomologicalComplex C c) := ⟨fun p _ =>
  ⟨NormalMono.mk _ (cokernel.π p) (cokernel.condition _)
    (isLimitOfEval _ _ (fun _ =>
      Abelian.isLimitMapConeOfKernelForkOfι _ _))⟩⟩

name: HomologicalComplex.exact_of_degreewise_exact
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
S : CategoryTheory.ShortComplex (HomologicalComplex C c)
hS : ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (HomologicalComplex.eval C c i)).Exact
⊢ S.Exact
decl:
lemma exact_of_degreewise_exact (hS : ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (eval C c i)).Exact) :
    S.Exact := by
  simp only [ShortComplex.exact_iff_isZero_homology] at hS ⊢
  rw [IsZero.iff_id_eq_zero]
  ext i
  apply (IsZero.of_iso (hS i) (S.mapHomologyIso (eval C c i)).symm).eq_of_src

name: HomologicalComplex.shortExact_of_degreewise_shortExact
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
S : CategoryTheory.ShortComplex (HomologicalComplex C c)
hS : ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (HomologicalComplex.eval C c i)).ShortExact
⊢ S.ShortExact
decl:
lemma shortExact_of_degreewise_shortExact
    (hS : ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (eval C c i)).ShortExact) :
    S.ShortExact where
  mono_f := mono_of_mono_f _ (fun i => (hS i).mono_f)
  epi_g := epi_of_epi_f _ (fun i => (hS i).epi_g)
  exact := exact_of_degreewise_exact S (fun i => (hS i).exact)

name: HomologicalComplex.exact_iff_degreewise_exact
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
S : CategoryTheory.ShortComplex (HomologicalComplex C c)
⊢ Iff S.Exact (∀ (i : ι), (S.map (HomologicalComplex.eval C c i)).Exact)
decl:
lemma exact_iff_degreewise_exact :
    S.Exact ↔ ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (eval C c i)).Exact := by
  constructor
  · intro hS i
    exact hS.map (eval C c i)
  · exact exact_of_degreewise_exact S

name: HomologicalComplex.shortExact_iff_degreewise_shortExact
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
ι : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian C
S : CategoryTheory.ShortComplex (HomologicalComplex C c)
⊢ Iff S.ShortExact (∀ (i : ι), (S.map (HomologicalComplex.eval C c i)).ShortExact)
decl:
lemma shortExact_iff_degreewise_shortExact :
    S.ShortExact ↔ ∀ (i : ι), (S.map (eval C c i)).ShortExact := by
  constructor
  · intro hS i
    have := hS.mono_f
    have := hS.epi_g
    exact hS.map (eval C c i)
  · exact shortExact_of_degreewise_shortExact S
